Room.Name: Rutger Castle Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a shallow ravine below a north-south mountain ridge. The road
Room.LongDescription: rises in both directions from here. To the northwest, you can see a building beside the wide road, and to the southeast you see the bottom of a series of winding switchbacks leading to the mountain fortress of Prince Rutger. The fortress itself is high on the side of the mountian.
